name: test_NAF_9_6_0_Delete_Program
description:
Test that an admin user can delete program using the 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Delete the program using 3 dots menu
6. Verify program is successfully deleted
descriptionHtml:

statusMessage:

Please use the Async API instead.
